title: Cannot buy rp!
body:
The only thing that happens when I try to purchase RP is that i get a pop-up window that says "You have encountered an error. Please try agian later."
Is there something I can do?

replies.body:
Hi Cloooud,

This may just be a temporary issue, have you tried closing the game client and re-launching it?

If that hasn't helped, you can follow the instructions at this [help article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753024-Store-Error-Error-You-have-encountered-an-error-Please-try-again-later-).
The things listed there does not seem to work for me, I'll try some more but is there any other way?

Unfortunately, that's all I could find documented on the issue :(

You can always [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) or wait for a helpful poro to come along and assist :)
Okay, thank you for taking time and actually trying to help me! <3

I see you Xaeros!  Thanks for helping out!
{{sticker:katarina-love}}

Hey, no worries, just hanging around while I wait on my own question to get answered, trying to be useful.
{{sticker:sg-kiko}}
Sorry friend, it's been a busy preseason.  Toss me a link and I'll check it out for you. :D

No hurry, I have a feeling my issue will resolve itself in the next couple hours anyway :)

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/LXEAnow1-daily-purchase-limit-on-mystery-champions

Hey there, is this happening at check out or when trying to load the page for RP purchasing?  This might be a connection problem that's having issues loading the store.  If that's the case then our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should be able to help you out.  

If it's at checkout, then there might be an issue with payment processing and our billing team would best be best to assist you in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
It is when I try to checkout.

Hey, thanks for the update on that!  We'll definitely want to check this out with you privately and figure out the issue.  Reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll get back to you as soon as we can.
Okay thank you for the time you spent helping me out! <3{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
